summary: Make encounters with the named Dragon Priests a more challenging and rewarding experience.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932683305/images/KA_00title_armory_256.png[/img]
[i]Take a journey through time in the lost Dragon Priest temple, Revakheim. Unlock unique gear and create armor not seen since the First Era.
Gain new powers and become stronger than ever. Fight ancient enemies and fulfill your destiny as the true "[/i]Konahrik[i]" Warlord.[/i]

[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386930029772/images/konah_ed_50px.png[/img][/center]

Key Features

❖ Explore a Massive New Dungeon
Find the lost Dragon Priest temple, Revakheim, and uncover it many wonders.

❖ Become the True Warlord
Collect all of Konahrik's armor by traveling to Revakheim's past.

❖ Dragon Priest Armory
Find and craft all 24 Dragon Priest sets.

❖ New Powers, Enchantments, Magic and more
Cleanse the High Dragon Priests' armor and uncover their powerful magical properties using the forgotten Abjuration magic.

❖ Dragon Priest Rematch
Resurrect slain Dragon Priests by using their masks in a special ceremony.

ALSO INCLUDES SKYRE AND REQUIEM PATCHES!

See [url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/]Official Site[/url] for full documentation.

[i][u]Quick Links[/u][/i]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragon-priest-armory/armor]➤ Armor[/url]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragon-priest-armory/scrolls-of-abjuration]➤ Abjuration Scrolls[/url]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragon-priest-armory/revakhheim]➤ Revakheim[/url]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragon-priest-armory/kamainquest]➤ Quest[/url]

[center]
[youtube]CAmc9N_ei4U[/youtube] [youtube]HtlKuduIdNg[/youtube]

[youtube]iG3VD6gCtEw[/youtube] [youtube]FU0DBHMklkg[/youtube][/center]

Other Languages:
[url=http://tes.riotpixels.com/mods/skyrim/gameplay/readme/konahriks-accoutrements][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZDmlA.png[/img]Russian
[/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43533//?][img]http://i.imgur.com/qRaqE.png[/img][/url]German (Out-of-date)

FAQ

Q: Does this require any DLC?
A: No.

Q: Is this mod compatible with...?
A: Yes, most likely. This mod is compatibile with 99.9% of the mods out there. It mod doesn't alter the Dragon Priests or their masks. If you use a mask retexture, make sure it is below this mod in your load order.

Q: How do I start Konahrik's Accoutrements?
A: To start the documented quest, you must read The Dragon Forge or enter Revakheim.

Q: Where is Revakheim?
A: Reading The Dragon Forge book will add a map marker. If you don't wish to find the book or read it, use the Revakheim quicklink above to be directed to the Official page, which has a map.

Q: Do you provide armor stats or IDs for the items in this mod?
A: For the most part, yes, most items' IDs can be found on the Official Site.

Q: I'm stumped. I can't figure out what to do next. Can you give me a hint?
A: If you are stuck, clicking on the Quest quicklink above will direct you to a full walkthrough of Revakheim.

[i]Special Thanks and Acknowledgements[/i]
I'd like to thank Gechbal, creator [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40216/?]Stormlord Armor[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46672/?]Emporer's Will[/url], for adding the original amulet.
WarlordKonahrik's work on the Official Site.
The dedicated BETA testers.
The Youtube channels that have featured this work.
To all the people who have made donations. Thank you for your generous support!

Related Mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48776/?][img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932317694/images/KA_00title_warlord_256.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48777/?][img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932722334/images/KA_00title_dpe_256.png[/img][/url]
author: Edhelsereg

files.name: Konahriks Accoutrements - DPE
files.changelogHtml:
New Features:
Modules - promote more compatibility and choice
Misc Dragon Priest Loot
Craftable Scrolls of Abjuration
Dragon Priest Rematches
Vokun's set are now purple


Fixes
Main esp doesn't change the dragon priests or mask in any may
Non-respawning Scrolls are quest aliases so they will not vanish when their cells reload.

files.name: Konahriks Accoutrements - DPE
files.changelogHtml:
Optimized files, reducing the download size by almost 30%
Krosis's unique color is now olive green
Dragon Priests are now uncapped (lvl 50 - 100)
New Boot Texture (back part)

files.name: Hood Texture Files
files.changelogHtml:
==================
Main module changes
==================
New armored robes models

Armor values have been adjusted:
Gloves and boots just under dragon quality
Cloth Robes have a minimal armor rating, but still work with Mage Armor
Armored Robes are Daedric Quality

Dragon Worship set perk has been renamed to Thu'um Kogaan, and is now only granted to matching sets (no more mixing and matching)

Fixed Konahrik Gauntlets bug

==========================
Dragonborn Add-On changes
==========================
New armored robes models

Armor values have been adjusted:
Gloves and boots just under dragon quality
Cloth Robes have a minimal armor rating, but still work with Mage Armor
Armored Robes are Daedric Quality

Shcism set perk has been split into three perks that each specialize in a single destruction element.

Miraak gear is upgradable
Upgraded gear is improvable at a workbench

Heavy and Light Miraak set

New Miraak set perk, Dovahkriid

=============================
Dragon Priests, Enhanced changes
=============================
Removed magic resist, from most of the dragon priests, so they are only resistant to one element.

=======================================================================================
SkyRe patch now a separate esp, with new requirements

files.name: Konahriks Accoutrements - DPA
files.changelogHtml:
New Dungeon - Revakheim

Mini-quest to find the lost Dragon Forge

9 New crafted sets

Reworked many shaders for all the armors.

Improved the usefulness of Abjuration Scrolls (cure disease and new blessing)

Morokei's robes now make you glow at night.

Dragonborn Add-On and Dragon Priests, Enhanced have thier own pages now.

files.name: Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory
files.changelogHtml:
DUNGEON
- Revakheim is now located on a mountain west of Windhelm, between Anga's Mill and Fort Kastav.
- Documented quest called "Konahrik's Accoutrements"
- Revakheim and Revakheim (past) have been expanded.
- The "Dragon Priest Rematch" feature has been moved to secret chamber inside Revakheim.

ARMOR
- Recalculated all armor stats.
- Unique Dragon Priest Gauntlets and Boots now are cursed and have unique enchantments.
- Konahrik's robes, gauntlets, and boots have new enchantments
- Crafted armor is now tiered
- Glass Armor has a new Texture
- Mask hoods and armored robes have a new model to fit the robes better
- Silver Armor has a new perk that protects against undead damage.
- Unique Cloth Robes all have 0 armor now, except Konahrik's Robes

MAGIC
- Abjuration Scrolls are now a projectile-type spells that remove dragon priest curses and severely damages dragon priests.

CRAFTING
- Dragonskin Parchment is now dragonhide, and can be crafted from either dragon scales or dragon heartscales.
- Abjuration Scrolls no longer require the Arcane Blacksmith perk and are now crafted at a tanning rack.

MISC
- "The Dragon Forge" book has a unique texture
- Book have been re-written to accomidate changes.

FIXES
-Glass Plated Robes are now classified as light armor, instead of heavy

DRAGONBORN ADD-ON

DUNGEON
New Apocrypha zone for Dragon Priest resurrection

ARMOR
- New Stalhrim texture
- New Miraak heavy gauntlet model (like Konahrik's)
- New Heart Stone perk
- Recalculated all armor stats.

CRAFTING
- Miraak's set requires Ebony and Daedra Hearts to craft and temper
- Unenchanted Destruction staves are now craftable at the Dragon Forge
- Ahzidal, Dukaan, and Zahkriisos' armor requires Daedric Smithing perk to upgrade.
HOTFIXES
Robes can no longer be taken while portcullis is closed.
Moonstone Mask female textures are fixed.
"Room seams" in Revakheim are no longer visible.
Silver armor perk now includes ghosts, werewolves, and in DB Add-On, werebears.
